channel.title: How to make a npc talk when you click talk (JUST LOOK)
channel.description: hi you know on runescape when you click on talk on a man and the guy says stuff, How do you do it?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2007, 09:10:01 PM[/size][hr]omg anyone know??

item.title: How to make a npc talk when you click talk (JUST LOOK)
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

I have…
case 155: //first Click npc
int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);
int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
faceNPC(NPCSlot);
boolean FishingGo = false;
boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
if (NPCID == 309) { /Lure From Lure & Bait - Any Sea/
if (IsItemInBag(309) == true && IsItemInBag(314) == true) {
FishingGo = true;
fishing[8] = 4;
fishing[1] = Item.fishing_fly_lvl[0];
fishing[5] = 314;
fishing[6] = 309;
fishing[7] = 0x26E;
} else {

right under it i dont get what your saying…

item.title: How to make a npc talk when you click talk (JUST LOOK)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“gikid, post:1, topic:132106”][quote author=ChemicalReaction™ link=topic=182808.msg1664957#msg1664957 date=1186776789]
Why is everyone critisising him? look at my rep & i have no clue how to.
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 04:11:49 PM[/size][hr]Oh…
And Btw. this is the right section, so u might aswell help him
[/quote]

That’s because MoparScape rep == shit[/quote]
You should see RuneServer Rep. Lol.

Ok fine Doggie.

I’ll make it brief. Go to client.java and under the case that indicates First Click NPC,

case 155: //first Click npc

Make it so when you click on the NPC it directs you to a dialougue. Make sure it includes

NpcDialogue = YOURDIALOUGEID;

Then create the dialougue under

public void UpdateNPCChat() {

Making the case number with YOURDIALOUGEID above. And you’ll also have to tell it what to do when you click continue so go to

case 40

And take a look at the code there and make it so when you click continue it stops and closes the dialogue. There you go you’re done.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a npc talk when you click talk (JUST LOOK)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

doggiedoo86:

It is my own… It was based of pimpscape… add NPC’s pkbox… Stuff… So i added elf bank, new traning place so STFU

All you did was makeGlobalObject()… You didnt even do the training code yourself, you just used the objects that were already using it and moved them or spawned them in a new location, then called the training place your own.

And its not hard to make NPC Dialogues, just compare ones you’ve seen ingame and make your own. It’s really quite simple.

Read full topic
